title: Bought Worlds 2017 Icons/Quests & Missions
body: Heyo! So I bought a worlds Icon and emote, I am wondering if that will count towards my quests/missions. If not it's fine, but maybe just a tip, if I paid, let me have it :P

replies.body: Yup, you're fine!  Any Worlds specific icon should work for missions!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Iwv3T4Ic,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-22T21:25:46.387+0000)
>
> Yup, you're fine!  Any Worlds specific icon should work for missions!

do world icons from last year also work?
